message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $90 for the product. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $85 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $98. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $85 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle and find a mutually beneficial price.
